item.title: A guide to create my website
item.description: Hugo and Github Page Hugo is an open source static site generator. You can find many cool themes inside. With help of Hugo and Github Pages, it is easy to deploy a customized website. Let’s see how it works. OS Version: Windows 10 Hugo 0.83.1 Theme: Notepadium 2.6.2 STEP 1. Install Hugo A guide video can be seen here Create a directory at C:/Hugo/bin Download hugo release Extract all to path C:/Hugo/bin Add C:/Hugo/bin to environmental path In your terminal, type hugo version to check if installed correctly STEP 2.
